title: Thermodynamics
description: Introduction to thermodynamics. Thermodynamic properties, energy and mass conservation, entropy and the second law. Second-law analysis of thermodynamic systems, gas cycles, vapor cycles.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (PHYS 2211 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or PHYS 2231 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and (MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2413 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C)
